Title: Clarifies that individuals have the ability to vote by absentee ballot if they are not currently incarcerated for a felony conviction
Summary: Clarifies that individuals have the ability to vote by absentee ballot in certain elections if they are not currently incarcerated for a felony conviction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the town law, in relation to clarifying that individuals have the ability to vote by absentee ballot if they are not currently incarcerated for a felony conviction
